Geothermal heat pump.Description: Geothermal heat pumps utilize the natural heat from the Earth to provide heating and cooling for buildings.
A geothermal heat pump is a type of ground source heat pump that uses the Earth's heat as a source for heating and cooling.
Geothermal heat pumps incorporate a heat exchanger to transfer heat between the refrigerant and the ground or water source.
Geothermal heat pumps are a sustainable and renewable heating solution, reducing reliance on fossil fuels.
